attributes.action: in line with current market trends reduce significantly the HMRC beneficial loans interest rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With interest rates dropping like a stone and the government trying to encourage lending HMRC have yet to adjust their tax rate for beneficial loans. This currently sits at 6.25%, more than double the curernt BoE base rate and it should be brought in line rather than giving with one hand and taxing back with the other.
